name: lancommander
description: LANCommander is a self hosted platform for managing and launching games over a local network. It centralizes game files, metadata and launch configurations so LAN parties or shared setups can quickly start multiplayer sessions.
features: Game Library: Centralized game storage, Metadata management, Cover art. Organize LAN party games.
Quick Launch: One-click game start, Configuration management, Multiplayer setup. Start gaming faster.
Network Distribution: Local file sharing, Fast downloads, Version control. Share games across LAN efficiently.
Metadata Management: Game information, Cover art, Platform details. Rich game library organization.
Save Management: Save file sync, Backup support, Cloud saves. Protect player progress.
Multiplayer Setup: Server configuration, Player management, Network optimization. Streamline LAN gaming.
Version Control: Game updates, Patch management, Rollback support. Keep games current.
User Profiles: Player accounts, Game preferences, Personal libraries. Individual gaming experiences.
